page.title: 12Celebrations in Patchway
page.content: On my birthday I play lots of games like musical bumps, musical statues and pass the parcel. We have food like crisps, cakes, chocolate bisciuts and peanuts. When we have eaten all the food everyone sings "Happy birthday". We all wear our best clothes and shoes and have brushed hair. I get lots of presents. I like all the presents. I like writing to thank people for the presents, and inviting people round to stay for the night. Sometimes I get Barbie and Sindy Dolls, and clothes for them. I like my parties, they are good fun. I invite all my friends. I like to have a cake in the shape of a bunny rabbit, G, or a Victoria Plum shape, with a ballet dancer on the top and happy birthday. My birthday is on the 24th of July.
